short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This regex search tool highlights matches on a page, allowing navigation between results and copying matches to the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔍 𝗥𝗲𝗴𝗲𝘅 𝗦𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵 𝗘𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻: Highlight matches on a page, navigate between results, and copy them to your clipboard with ease!
The Regex Search extension is a powerful tool for users who need advanced text search and manipulation capabilities. By utilizing the flexibility of regular expressions, this tool allows for complex search queries and precise text operations.
💡 𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀:
✅ 𝗥𝗲𝗴𝗲𝘅 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗧𝗲𝘅𝘁 𝗦𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵: Perform intricate searches using regular expressions or simple text queries. The extension supports a wide range of regex syntax, enabling users to create detailed search patterns for accurate data extraction and manipulation.
✅ 𝗖𝗮𝘀𝗲 𝗦𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗧𝗼𝗴𝗴𝗹𝗲: Switch effortlessly between case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches. Tailor your search criteria to match exact cases or ignore case differences, giving you more control over your searches.
✅ 𝗖𝗼𝗽𝘆 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁𝘀: After running a search, copy the matched results to your clipboard with a single click. This feature makes it easy to transfer important data to other applications or documents, improving workflow efficiency.
✅ 𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗹-𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗦𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁𝘀: Get instant feedback as you type your query. See matches appear dynamically, helping you refine your search patterns and ensure accuracy as your search evolves.
This version provides a clear explanation of the features and benefits of the Regex Search extension, making it easy to understand and appealing to users who need advanced search functionality.
